info.title: NHS England IHE Privacy Consent on FHIR (PCF)
info.description:
CapabilityStatement for the Consent Authorization Server Actor for use within the English NHS (Enterprise Architecture) and or NHS England (Solution Architecture). 
This is part of the NHS England National Extension (Volume 4) for [Privacy Consent on FHIR (PCF)](https://profiles.ihe.net/ITI/PCF/index.html). 

 This profile is implemented by 
 - [National Proxy Service](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/) 

 These services are potentially used by 

**NHS England** 

 - [National Record Locator](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/national-record-locator-fhir) 
 - [Security and authorisation](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/guides-and-documentation/security-and-authorisation) 

**English NHS and NHS England Services** 

 used in the implementation of the following profiles or services 

 - [NRL producer system](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/national-record-locator-fhir/v3/producer) 
 - [IHE Mobile access to Health Documents (MHD)](https://profiles.ihe.net/ITI/MHD/index.html) 
 - [IHE Query for Existing Data for Mobile (QEDm)](https://build.fhir.org/ig/IHE/QEDm/branches/master/index.html)

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The patient. We may have issues supporting this in NHS England API's but we could assume the {id} of the patient is not transient and is the {nhsNumber} i.e. `patient={baseUrlOfPDS}/Patient/91000000009`

parameters.description: The patient identifier (MRN, NHS Number, etc).  In the English NHS this may be a SHALL

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: Who|what (RelatedPerson/Practitioner/Patient) is controlled by this rule

parameters.name: actor:identifier
parameters.description: Who|what (RelatedPerson - restrict to RelatedPerson for now for proxy) is controlled by this rule
